Items.Name: Speedrunner
Items.Effect: You pay 1 less [^Time] to travel

Items.Name: Tough
Items.Effect: Gain 3 Max Health

Items.Name: Resourceful
Items.Effect: You pay 1 Less [^Time] to take resources

Items.Name: Street Smarts
Items.Effect: You always get to look at another resource when taking resources

Items.Name: Lockdown Master
Items.Effect: Don't take damage from Lockdowns

Items.Name: Ghost
Items.Effect: You don't start with a Tag

Items.Name: Master of Disguise
Items.Effect: You may stay in the same district indefinitely without taking Tags

Items.Name: Multitasking
Items.Effect: The second consequitive action taken at the same location takes 1 less [^Time]

Items.Name: Right Under Their Nose
Items.Effect: The second consequitive action taken at the same location doesn't give a Tag

Items.Name: Improved Conciousness
Items.Effect: While unconcious, you instead can draw and keep 1 invention

Items.Name: Medic
Items.Effect: You heal 4 Health with your personal action

Items.Name: Research Expert
Items.Effect: Whenever you design an invention you get to draw 1 more invention

Items.Name: Master Tinker
Items.Effect: You may once a round tinker an invention for free

Items.Name: Trade Expert
Items.Effect: You may buy and sell resources for 3 [^Money] at the Market

Items.Name: Market Hookup
Items.Effect: You may once per round perform a free Trade resources action

Items.Name: Camera Feed Password
Items.Effect: You may once per round look at one facedown event, resource, or obstacle

Items.Name: Camera Net
Items.Effect: While unconcious, you can hack for 3 less [^Time]

Items.Name: Hacking Specialist
Items.Effect: You no longer take Tags from resource tokens nor do you have to reveal them immidiately

Items.Name: Trap Disarming
Items.Effect: You no longer take Damage from resource tokens

Items.Name: Energy Drain
Items.Effect: You no longer pay [^Energy] for resource tokens

Items.Name: Chemist
Items.Effect: You no longer pay [^Chemicals] for resource tokens

Items.Name: Reusable Designs
Items.Effect: You no longer pay [^Parts] for resource tokens

Items.Name: Credit Trick
Items.Effect: You no longer pay [^Money] for resource tokens
